summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 24667, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the laying off, widening, altering and establishing of Twenty-sixth Avenue from Yesler Way to East Fir Street; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing that the payment for such improvement be made by special assessment upon property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law," approved July 25th, 1910 and published July 29th, 1910.
